item.title: Notes on GANS
item.description: Notes on the different implemenation of GAN Note That I’ve used the mentioned pytorch example, and built the models gradually over it NOTES: I Didn’t manage to implement a full working version of specNorm to work with pytorch So I implemented a simpler numpy version of the spectral normalization algorithm. Based on my understanding after skimming the paper and after reading the mentioned code example. I used the mentioned specNorm implementation of pytorch to be able to integrate it with my model.
